org.hps.readout.trigger2019

Class FEETrigger2019ReadoutDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.readout.TriggerDriver
          • org.hps.readout.trigger2019.FEETrigger2019ReadoutDriver

  • public class FEETrigger2019ReadoutDriver
extends TriggerDriver
    FEETrigger2019ReadoutDriver simulates an HPS FEE trigger for 2019 MC. It takes in clusters produced by the GTPClusterReadoutDriver, and perform the necessary trigger logic on them. If a trigger is detected, it is sent to the readout data manager so that a triggered readout event may be written. Prescale for various regions are not set.

      • setDaqConfigurationAppliedintoReadout

        public void setDaqConfigurationAppliedintoReadout(boolean state)
        Sets whether or not the DAQ configuration is applied into the driver the EvIO data stream or whether to read the configuration from data files.
        Parameters:
        state - - true indicates that the DAQ configuration is applied into the readout system, and false that it is not applied into the readout system.

      • getTimeDisplacement

        protected double getTimeDisplacement()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce its output. This indicates that the driver's present output was generated based on input a time equal to (getCurrentTime() - getTimeDisplacement()).
        Specified by:
        getTimeDisplacement in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getTimeNeededForLocalOutput

        Specified by:
        getTimeNeededForLocalOutput in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
